response.overview: After discovering a mystical bracelet capable of granting powers to others, Liam — a grieving teenager haunted by the loss of his mother — adopts the dark persona of Malrok. Obsessed with rewriting fate, he sets out to find the legendary Celestial Cycle Stone, an ancient Chinese artifact said to grant any wish. But to unlock its power, Malrok must manipulate souls, spread chaos, and gather emotional energy — risking his humanity along the way. How far would you go to change your past?
response.tagline: Power has a price. Desire has a cost.
response.title: The Cycle of Desire
